mapper.select: select rating_star, img_url, synopsis from movie_table where movie_id=#{movie_id}
select img_url from image_table where movie_id=#{movie_id} and img_type=#{img_type}
select name, profile_url from crew_table where movie_id=#{movie_id}
select count(*) from review_table where movie_id = #{movie_id}
mapper.insert: insert into image_table(movie_id, img_url, img_type) values(#{movie_id}, #{img_url}, #{img_type})
insert into crew_table(movie_id, name, profile_url) values(#{movie_id}, #{name}, #{profile_url})
insert into review_table(user_id, contents, rating_star, movie_id, writing_time) values(#{user_id}, #{contents}, #{rating_star}, #{movie_id}, #{writing_time})
